data.content:
noun
US or Brit colouring , pl -ings
[noncount] :the act of adding colors to something (such as a picture in a coloring book)
Her favorite activities include playing with stuffed animals and coloring.
something that produces color [noncount]
Our product contains no artificial coloring or flavoring.
She added some blue food coloring to the icing. [count]
artificial colorings
(US) a variety of hair colorings [=(Brit) colourants]
[noncount] the color of a person's skin and hair
This scarf will look great with your coloring.
He has very light coloring.
the color of an animal or plant
a bird's bright coloring [=coloration]
[noncount] :the way color is used
His paintings are notable for their bright coloring.
